title: When is the last date of the NIOS April 2018 exam form? - Quora

response.answer_text: NIOS Admission 2018-19 National Institute of Open Schooling (NIOS) has released the NIOS Admission Form for the academic year 2018-19. Candidates who were interested and filling to seek admission in class 10th and 12thcan apply through online mode on or before the last date. Application Fee (Without Late Fee): Male - Rs.1485/- (Secondary Class X) & Rs.1650/- (Sr. Secondary Class XII) Female - Rs.1210/- (Secondary Class X) & Rs.1375/- (Sr. Secondary Class XII) SC/ST & PWD - Rs.990/- (Secondary Class X) & Rs.1075/- (Sr. Secondary Class XII) Transfer of Credit Fee: 150 per subjects (X, XII) The additional subject fee will be Rs.600/- for both courses Get more adissional knowledge Regarding National Institute of Open Schooling (NIOS) Follow me
it is long over. the exams are in 5he comming week.if you r keen tarhet to take up on demand exams which is available every month regards NSH
